## Game Information

**Name**: <!-- Example: MyGame -->
<!-- Must match game_title set by Discord -->

**Folder**: <!-- Example: GameName/Binaries/Win64 -->
<!-- Folder path to the executable, must match actual game -->

**Executable**: <!-- Example: GameName.exe -->
<!-- Filename must match actual game -->

**Window Title**: <!-- Example: Game Name -->
<!-- Must match actual game's window title -->
